about_the_game:
Relax and enjoy the smooth and spacey sounds of One Deck Galaxy, an entire album of original music from Handelabra Games' in-house maestro, Jean-Marc Giffin:

One Deck Galaxy Theme
Exploring the Cosmos
Neeble-Woober Colony Fleet
Optimization Calibrator
Preservation Authority
The Hungry Nebula
Dark Star Syndicate
One Deck Galaxy Defeat
One Deck Galaxy Victory

This soundtrack is comprised of 320kbps MP3 files.
